vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐνωτίζομαι,
(οὖς) give ear, hearken to, λόγους [LXX+NT]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.shortDef: to listen carefully, pay attention to
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to listen carefully, pay attention to
to give ear, listen, pay attention to, Acts 2:14*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: eschuchar atentamante, ponerle cuidado, prestar atención
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 側耳而聽, 傾聽, 留心聽 (徒 2:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 侧耳而听, 倾听, 留心听 (徒 2:14)
